questions.title: 很高兴和你全家一起野餐。
questions.answer: It's a pleasure to go on a picnic with your families.

questions.title: 很高兴带你参观我们的庄园。
questions.answer: It's a pleasure to show our manor to you.

questions.title: 很高兴吃到你做的当地的食物。
questions.answer: It's a pleasure to eat the best local food you cook.

questions.title: 我很高兴成为你美国留学时期的第一个朋友。
questions.answer: It's a pleasure to be your first friend in time of studying abroad in theUSA.

questions.title: 露西让我告诉你，她很高兴看到你对她的真心实意。
questions.answer: Lucy let me tell you that it's a pleasure for her to see that you arehonest to her.

title: ——很高兴看到这么神奇的实验。
——我们还有很多发明创造。

answer.en: It's a pleasure to see such a magical experiment.

title: ——你对我们的招待满意吗？
——很高兴能给我们这么热情的接待。

answer.en: Are you satisfied with our reception?
It's a pleasure to give us such a warm reception.
It's a pleasure to complete this business.
